thread.title: Dad of teen who died in car crash slams cosmetics firm 'cashing in' on her death by naming lipstick after her
thread.title_full: Dad of teen who died in car crash slams cosmetics firm 'cashing in' on her death by naming lipstick after her

title: Dad of teen who died in car crash slams cosmetics firm 'cashing in' on her death by naming lipstick after her
text:
Opinion 'profiting from tragedy' Dad of teen who died in car crash slams cosmetics firm ‘cashing in’ on her death by naming lipstick after her 
'Heartless' Nathan Lippitt of Lippitts Cosmetics urged customers to buy lipstick tribute to speeding victim Elizabeth Buckley, 19, without asking family's permission Exclusive
